text:
As you and your class use the Ideas? button, your work is being categorized about where you are in your learning journey. Ada also gives some new activities to try, and perhaps you've also seen examples from a classmate called Ivan Idea.

Look at the Class Gallery tab, and switch the Sort by to Learning Journey.

Where did your work get sorted? What about your groupmates? Other classmates? Are you all in the same place or scattered?

What about Ivan's work?

Copy this question to your document and reflect on the utility of this AI interaction.

If you were to pick new categories for a class you teach, what is the class topic, and what sorting categories would you use?

Did you find you responded differently to advice given by Ada vs. examples given by Ivan? How would each of these be used?
